item.title: 2020 Christmas Gift Guide: Must-Have Gadgets for the Holiday Season
item.description:
As the year ends, it’s the perfect time to treat yourself. Check out these gadgets for relaxation and maybe even work: OPPO Find X2 Pro smartphone The OPPO Find X2 Pro blends technology and elegant design. Marketed as “a cinema in your hand,” it boasts a 120 Hz QHD+ Ultra Vision screen with exceptional resolution, color, refresh rate, and brightness. Enjoy immersive audio and video with its powerful dual speakers and Dolby Atmos...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/2020-christmas-gift-guide-must-have-gadgets-for-the-holiday-season/

item.title: Dyson introduces the cordless Cyclone V10 vacuum cleaner
item.description:
• The Dyson Cyclone V10, Dyson’s newest stick vacuum, is cordless. • Although smaller and lighter, the Dyson digital motor V10 boasts a 20% increase in suction power compared to the Dyson V8 cord-free vacuum. Dyson has introduced the Cyclone V10 cord-free vacuum cleaner, promising suction exceeding typical stick vacuums. The key is the new Dyson digital motor V10, weighing almost half its predecessor, the Dyson digital motor V8. This is Dyson’s fastest and most power-dense digital vacuum motor, reaching speeds up to 125,000 rpm...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dyson-introduces-the-cordless-cyclone-v10-vacuum-cleaner/

item.title: The Singapore Expo CNY Fair offers daily discounts of S$380 to the first 888 customers
item.description:
Red envelopes containing discounts, called angbaos, can be redeemed for certain products in addition to existing promotions (terms and conditions apply). Items will be offered at up to 88% off. The Singapore Expo CNY Fair will distribute complimentary lucky angbao gift packages, each valued at S$380, to the initial 888 attendees daily from January 10th to 12th. The event will be held at Singapore Expo Hall 6, open from 12 pm to 9 pm each day...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-singapore-expo-cny-fair-offers-daily-discounts-of-s-380-to-the-first-888-customers/
